org.jamesframework.core.search.neigh

Interface Move<SolutionType extends Solution>

  • Type Parameters:
    SolutionType - the solution type to which move can be applied, required to extend Solution
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SubsetMove
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSubsetMove, AdditionMove, DeletionMove, GeneralSubsetMove, SwapMove

    public interface Move<SolutionType extends Solution>
    Interface of a move that can be applied to a generic solution type. Contains methods to apply the move to a given solution and to undo the move after it has been applied.
    Author:
    Herman De Beukelaer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(SolutionType solution)
      Apply this move to the given solution.
      void undo(SolutionType solution)
      Undo this move after it has been applied to the given solution.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        void apply(SolutionType solution)
        Apply this move to the given solution.
        Parameters:
        solution - solution to which the move is applied
        Throws:
        SolutionModificationException - if the solution can not be modified according to the applied move

      • undo

        void undo(SolutionType solution)
        Undo this move after it has been applied to the given solution. It is assumed that the solution has not been modified in any way since the move was applied; if so, the behaviour of this method is undefined.
        Parameters:
        solution - solution to which the move has been applied
